snippet.title: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the dark world, and check out gameplay and combat from Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th in this trailer for the RPG roguelike game. Sin Slayers: Reign of the 8th returns to Steam, bringing new content, improved gameplay, and more. A demo for Sin Slayers: Reign of the 8th is available now on Steam. 

Set in a world overwhelmed by sin and monsters, players are tasked with assembling a party of tormented heroes who are bound to this cursed realm. Every sinful action brings greater rewards but also greater dangers, culminating in encounters with the Sin Lords themselves.
